trans:
We need people for some various tasks as part of operation of our club. Below there is a list of roles we can take up together to fully develop ARTJAM. We encourage you to sign for tasks, which you are interested in - together we can do something really special!
ğŸ”¹ Social media management - publishing posts, creating stories, organizing surveys
ğŸ”¹ Photography and documentation - recording what we do on the photos
ğŸ”¹ Searching for exhibitions and galleries - choosing inspiring locations to visit
ğŸ”¹ Searching for artistic contests - keeping a list of artistic possibilities for the club
ğŸ“‹ [Link for the table of responsibilities division] https[redacted_url]imy in order to put your name in the table by each of you who is interested in taking up one of these roles!
3. This year, thanks to the funding from the university in the amount of PLN 7,000, we are able to implement the following projects:
